reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 118/08: DISSOLUTION OF CERTAIN HOSPITAL CROWN FOUNDATIONS
reg_info.reg_name_text: DISSOLUTION OF CERTAIN HOSPITAL CROWN FOUNDATIONS
reg_info.act_under: Crown Foundations Act, 1996   Loi de 1996 sur les fondations de la Couronne

content.content: 1. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as “The Baycrest Hospital Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 1 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of “The Baycrest Hospital Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of The Baycrest Centre Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as “The Baycrest Hospital Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 1 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of “The Baycrest Hospital Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of The Baycrest Centre Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 1 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “Mount Sinai Hospital Crown Foundation”
content.content: 2. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Mount Sinai Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 2 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of the “Mount Sinai Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Mount Sinai Hospital Foundation of Toronto. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Mount Sinai Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 2 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “Mount Sinai Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Mount Sinai Hospital Foundation of Toronto. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 2 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “North York General Hospital Crown Foundation”
content.content: 3. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “North York General Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 3 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of the “North York General Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the North York General Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “North York General Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 3 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “North York General Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the North York General Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 3 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “The Sunnybrook Hospital Crown Foundation”
content.content: 4. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as “The Sunnybrook Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 4 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of “The Sunnybrook Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 4 (2).
content.raw_html:
4. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as “The Sunnybrook Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 4 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of “The Sunnybrook Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 4 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “Toronto East General Hospital Crown Foundation”
content.content: 5. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Toronto East General Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 5 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of the “Toronto East General Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Toronto East General Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 5 (2).
content.raw_html:
5. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Toronto East General Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 5 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “Toronto East General Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Toronto East General Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 5 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “The Toronto Hospital Crown Foundation”
content.content: 6. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as “The Toronto Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 6 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of “The Toronto Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of The Toronto General and Western Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 6 (2).
content.raw_html:
6. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as “The Toronto Hospital Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 6 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of “The Toronto Hospital Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of The Toronto General and Western Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 6 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “Women’s College and Wellesley Central Crown Foundation”
content.content: 7. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Women’s College and Wellesley Central Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 7 (1). (2) Upon the dissolution of the “Women’s College and Wellesley Central Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Women’s College Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 7 (2).
content.raw_html:
7. (1) The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council dated December 4, 1996 under section 2 of the Act and known as the “Women’s College and Wellesley Central Crown Foundation” is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 7 (1).

(2) Upon the dissolution of the “Women’s College and Wellesley Central Crown Foundation” under subsection (1), the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Women’s College Hospital Foundation. O. Reg. 118/08, s. 7 (2).

content.section: Dissolution of “Women’s College and Wellesley Central Crown Foundation”
content.content: 8. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 118/08, s. 8.
